subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Basketball
lead_paragraph: If the Miami Heat faces the Dallas Mavericks in the N.B.A. finals, it would be the first time in naming-rights history that two teams playing in arenas named for the same corporation played for a major sports title.
snippet: If the Miami Heat faces the Dallas Mavericks in the N.B.A. finals, it would be the first time in naming-rights history that two teams playing in arenas named for the same corporation played for a major sports title.
